name: 林信標
objective:
1.無線通訊系統簡介
2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹
3.無線電通訊的傳播原理
4.行動通訊之調變技術
5.行動通訊之多工技術
6.天線?多元性與系統分析
7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼
8.無線網路系統
9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
schedule:
1 week   Evolution of Wireless Communications
1 weeks   Basic Concepts of Wireless Communications
2 weeks　　Mobile Radio Propagation and Multipath Fading
2 weeks　　GSM and GPRS
2 weeks　　CDMA, WCDMA and HSPA
3 weeks   MIMO OFDM
4 weeks   4G Systems
3 Weeks　　Final Project Presentations
scorePolicy:
I. Midterm Exam. (30%)
II. Term project
1.Select a topic related to mobile communications (HSPA, LTE, or WiMAX)
2.Go to IEEExploer find 3 reference papers regarding your topics.
?Read them and write 2-4 pages summary/comments on each paper.[30%]
3.Oral presentation (including power point file)of your work (must focus on your contributions, comparison or simulation results) [40%]
